fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Armored: You start out with a 1-shot Autovest.
-Defense: The first time someone attacks you, negate the attack. Does not apply to Astral or Indirect attacks.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Protection: Negate one attacking card done to a person this round or the next. If they are attacked, they will appear to play a Block!. 2 uses, 4 round cooldown. You may not use this if you used Deflect this night.
-Vest: You may roleblock yourself tomorrow night for a 1-night powerful vest/
-Deflect: You may choose to redirect a attack on another person to a person of your choice. You may not use this if you used Protection this round or the round prior. 1 use.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the King.
